ingredients.item: 2 sprigs of rosemary and 1 lemon thinly sliced, to serve

instructions.step: Steep the teabags in a jug with 300ml boiling water for 8 minutes. Remove the teabags. Stir in the caster sugar, leave to cool then chill.
Pour the chilled tea into a jug, stir in the vermouth, vodka, lemon juice and plenty of ice.
Pour into chilled glasses or tea cups and serve with sprigs of rosemary and slices of lemon.
